channel.title: DevOps Thoughts and Ruminations
channel.description: Recent content on DevOps Thoughts and Ruminations

item.title: A little about me
item.description: Hello, My name is James! By trade, and by heart, I’m a devops engineer. I have lived in a lot of places, but these days, I call Vietnam home. My nedlife started when a friend’s father brought home a teensy little computer named the Timex Sinclair 1000. characters. My opportunities with the machime were quite limited, but I was hooked. Within a year, I had my own computer, a Tandy Color Computer 2, known fondly as a “Trash 80” Tandy Color Computer 2

item.title: How to Contact Me
item.description: one of my email addresses On FB I am tehjaydeebee jblackwb on reddit I am jdblack on Github My resume A quick word about time zones These days I live in Hồ Chí Minh City, Vientam, also known as Saigon. Because of this, the time for me is 12-15 hours ahead of America. In other words, I’m usually heading to bed just as you’re waking up.
